GlossaryÂ¶

Symbol Definition Unit
\(D\) Turbine rotor diameter (fixed parameter, \(D=27\) m) m
\(t\) Time s
\(t_*\) Integral time scale computed from time series at a point s
\(x, y, z\) Spatial coordinates, where \(x\) is aligned with the mean wind m
\(n_t,n_x,n_y,n_z\) Number points in time and space dimensions -
\(u\) Wind vector component along \(x\) m/s
\(v\) Wind vector component along \(y\) m/s
\(w\) Wind vector component along \(z\) m/s
\(U\) Magnitude of horizontal wind speed vector m/s
\(v_{los}\) Wind vector component along the line of sight of each lidar beam m/s
\(\beta\) Direction of horizontal wind speed vector deg
\(\Delta \beta\) Veer computed at fixed \((x,y)\) from two distinct \(z\) points deg
\(TI\) Turbulence intensity computed over a 10-min period %
\(\alpha\) Power law exponent derived from \(U(z=10~\mathrm{m})\) and \(U(z=58~\mathrm{m})\) -
\(u_*\) Friction velocity m/s
\(\theta\) Potential temperature K
\(\theta_v\) Virtual potential temperature K
\(\overline{w'\theta_v'}\) Kinematic vertical turbulent heat flux K m/s
\(L\) Obukhov length m
\(z_0\) Roughness length m
\(\overline{q}\) Temporal average of variable \(q\) unit of \(q\)
\(\langle q \rangle\) Ensemble average of variable \(q\) unit of \(q\)
\(q'\) Temporal perturbation of variable \(q\), defined as \(q-\overline{q}\) unit of \(q\)
\(q_{hub}\) Variable \(q\) evaluated at hub height unit of \(q\)
\(\sigma_q\) Standard deviation of some quantity \(q\) (over time, space, or an ensemble) unit of \(q\)
\(q_{rotor}\) Variable \(q\) evaluated across the rotor in the vertical direction unit of \(q\)
\(q_{wake}\) Variable \(q\) evaluated in the wake unit of \(q\)
\(P\) Generator power kW
\(M_x\) Out-of-plane (flapwise) bending moment evaluated at the blade root N m
